questions.question: Explain how the principle of progressive overload can be applied to improve muscular strength. Use practical examples in your answer.
answer: - Gradually increasing the demand on the body
- Starting with 3 sets of 8 reps at 20kg
- Progressing to 3 sets of 10 reps at 25kg after 4 weeks
questions.explanation: This question tests understanding of training principles and their practical application.

questions.question: Analyse how the commercialisation of football has affected participation rates at grassroots level. Include both positive and negative effects.
answer: - More media coverage inspiring young players
- Focus on elite level rather than grassroots
